title: A Display of My Dark Power
text: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.
flavour: What would you say is my greatest attribute? Is it my gluttonous lust for power?

title: All In Good Time
text: When you set this scheme in motion, take an extra turn after this one. Schemes can't be set in motion that turn.
flavour: Take a moment. Ponder the depths of your insignificance.

title: All Shall Smolder in My Wake
text: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy up to one target artifact, up to one target enchantment, and up to one target nonbasic land.
flavour: It's my goal to find the melting point of every substance.

title: Approach My Molten Realm
text: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, if a source would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.
flavour: It's a dragon-infested lavascape of notorious peril. Make yourselves at home.

title: Behold the Power of Destruction
text: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy all nonland permanents target opponent controls.
flavour: I'd call that a successful first test. Golem! Rearm the Doom Citadel!

title: Choose Your Champion
text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses a player. Until your next turn, only you and the chosen player can cast spells and attack with creatures.
flavour: It seems the fate of the world rests on your shoulders, feeble child.

title: Dance, Pathetic Marionette
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. Choose one of the revealed creature cards and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Put all other cards revealed this way into their owners' graveyards.

title: Embrace My Diabolical Vision
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You draw seven cards, then each other player draws four cards.
flavour: My vision is for the good of everyone. Mostly me.

title: Every Hope Shall Vanish
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a nonland card from each of those hands. Those players discard those cards.
flavour: Oh, I think I will get away with this.

title: Every Last Vestige Shall Rot
text: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, put each nonland permanent target player controls with converted mana cost X or less on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavour: May bloodberries grow from your remains.

title: Evil Comes to Fruition
text: When you set this scheme in motion, create seven 0/1 green Plant creature tokens. If you control ten or more lands, create seven 3/3 green Elemental creature tokens instead.
flavour: The plants justify the means.

title: Feed the Machine
text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, he or she sacrifices two creatures. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents sacrifices a creature.
flavour: Even you have a purpose. Your blood will oil the gears.

title: I Bask in Your Silent Awe
text: Each opponent can't cast more than one spell each turn.
abandonIf: At the beginning of your upkeep, if no opponent cast a spell since your last turn ended, abandon this scheme.

title: I Call on the Ancient Magics
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each other player searches his or her library for a card, reveals it, and puts it into his or her hand. Then you search your library for two cards and put them into your hand. Each player shuffles his or her library.

title: I Delight in Your Convulsions
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each other player searches his or her library for a card, reveals it, and puts it into his or her hand. Then you search your library for two cards and put them into your hand. Each player shuffles his or her library.
flavour: I can't imagine what you're feeling right now, but I'll try my best.

title: I Know All, I See All
text: Untap all permanents you control during each opponent's untap step.
abandonIf: At the beginning of each end step, if three or more cards were put into your graveyard this turn from anywhere, abandon this scheme.

title: Ignite the Cloneforge!
text: When you set this scheme in motion, create a token that's a copy of target permanent an opponent controls.
flavour: Heroes innovate. Villains duplicate.

title: Into the Earthen Maw
text: When you set this scheme in motion, exile up to one target creature with flying, up to one target creature without flying, and all cards from up to one target opponent's graveyard.
flavour: You may even see them again. Full digestion takes three hundred years.

title: Introductions Are in Order
text: When you set this scheme in motion, choose one: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library; or you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavour: Meet my newest minion. Come now, don't be shyâ€”shake her pincer.

title: Know Naught but Fire
text: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.
flavour: Cranial explosions for everyone. Still planning to outthink my dragons?

title: Look Skyward and Despair
text: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavour: Today I take the reins of destiny itself. Today the Draconic Apocalypse is upon you.

title: May Civilization Collapse
text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, he or she sacrifices two lands. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents sacrifices a land.
flavour: This should halt the spread of your insolence.

title: Mortal Flesh is Weak
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent's life total becomes the lowest life total among your opponents.
flavour: I certainly would have accepted my offer of eternal life. But if you choose death instead, who am I to argue?

title: My Crushing Masterstroke
text: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of all nonland permanents your opponents control until end of turn. Untap those permanents. They gain haste until end of turn. Each of them attacks its owner this turn if able.

title: My Genious Knows No Bound
text: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, you gain X life and draw X cards.
flavour: I can see . . . everything. The beginning and the end of time. The raw edges of reality. And now I see exactly how to kill you.

title: My Undead Horde Awakens
text: At the beginning of your end step, you may put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
abandonIf: When a creature put onto the battlefield with this scheme dies, abandon this scheme.

title: My Wish is Your Command
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals his or her hand. You may choose a noncreature, nonland card revealed this way and cast it without paying its mana cost.
flavour: Indulge me. Just one spell. One potentially fatal spell gone horribly awry.

title: Nature Demands an Offering
text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses a creature you don't control and puts it on top of its owner's library, then repeats this process for an artifact, an enchantment, and a land. Then the owner of each permanent chosen this way shuffles his or her library.

title: Nature Shields Its Own
text: Whenever a creature attacks and isn't blocked, if you're the defending player, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token that's blocking that creature.
abandonIf: When four or more creatures attack you, abandon this scheme at end of combat.

title: Nothing Can Stop Me Now
text: If a source an opponent controls would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.
abandonIf: At the beginning of each end step, if you've been dealt 5 or more damage this turn, abandon this scheme.

title: Only Blood Ends Your Nightmares
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. Then each opponent who didn't sacrifice a creature discards two cards.
flavour: But nothing will end your regret.

title: Realms Befitting My Majesty
text: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavour: Look around you. All you behold is mine to rule. It's the natural way.

title: Roots of All Evil
text: When you set this scheme in motion, create five 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavour: I assure you, these are not the kind that thrive on sunlight and water.

title: Rotted Ones, Lay Siege
text: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token that attacks that player each combat if able.
flavour: Don't come back until you've got brains in your teeth.

title: Surrender Your Thoughts
text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, he or she discards four cards. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents discards two cards.
flavour: Or, if you prefer, just surrender.

title: The Dead Shall Serve
text: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Each of those creatures attacks its owner each combat if able.
flavour: Tell your old master I said hello.

title: The Fate of the Flammable
text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, this scheme deals 6 damage to him or her. If the player chooses others, this scheme deals 3 damage to each of your other opponents.

title: The Iron Guardian Stirs
text: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 4/6 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
flavour: It would be disappointing if you were unable to overcome this simplest of defenses. Hilarious, but disappointing.

title: The Pieces Are Coming Together
text: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. Artifact spells you cast this turn cost {2} less to cast.
flavour: Cretins build machines. I construct destiny.

title: The Very Soil Shall Shake
text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample.
abandonIf: When a creature you control dies, abandon this scheme.

title: Tooth, Claw, and Tail
text: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy up to three target nonland permanents.
flavour: Silence your wailing. This is but a taste of the destruction my pets have in store.

title: Which of You Burns Brightest?
text: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, this scheme deals X damage to target opponent and each creature he or she controls.
flavour: Let that be a lesson to you, your family, and everyone you've ever known.

title: Your Fate is Thrice Sealed
text: When you set this scheme in motion, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield and the rest into your hand.
flavour: I can't abide laziness. Arise, forces of nature, and serve your master!

title: Your Puny Minds Cannot Fathom
text: When you set this scheme in motion, draw four cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.
flavour: I have seen far beyond this imperfect world, into a tomorrow that doesn't include you.

title: Your Will Is Not Your Own
text: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +3/+3 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.
flavour: Fool. I'll show you how to use that thing.

title: Plots thet Span Centuries
text: When you set this scheme in motion, the next time you would set a scheme in motion, set three schemes in motion instead.
flavour: I don't expect you to understand the myriad ways in which you're about to die.

title: Perhaps You've Met My Cohort
text: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
flavour: I'm calling in a favor from an old friend. Once you're all dead, I'll consider the matter settled.

title: Your Inescapable Doom
text: At the beginning of your end step, put a doom counter on this scheme, then this scheme deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to the opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. If two or more players are tied for the highest life total, you choose one.

title: Drench the Soil in their Blood
text: When you set this scheme in motion, after this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavour: Are they dead yet? No? Then my previous order stands.

title: Imprision this Insolent Wretch
text:
When you set this scheme in motion, choose an oppnent. 
Permenents the chosen player controls don't untap during his or her untap step.
abandonIf: When the chosen player is attacked or becomes the target of a spell or ability, abandon this scheme.

title: A Reckoning Approaches
text: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavour: The gates open to my new era.

title: Because I Have Willed It
text: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
abandonIf: At the beginning of your opponents' end step, if they cast four or more spells this turn, abandon this scheme.

title: Behold My Grandeur
text:
When you set this scheme in motion, add {U}{B}{R} to your mana pool. 
When you set this scheme in motion, if you control six or more lands, you may search your library for a card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

title: Bow to My Command
text:
As you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent. 
Creatures the chosen player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
abandonIf: At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may tap any number of untapped creatures they control with total power 8 or greater. If they do, abandon this scheme.

title: Choose Your Demise
text: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top four cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put the cards in that pile into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

title: Delight in the Hunt
text: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token and prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn.
flavour: Pain is a delusion of the weak. I'll demonstrate.

title: Every Dream a Nightmare
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent discards a card. You draw a card for each land card discarded this way.
flavour: Let me unburden you of these fatuous hopes.

title: For Each of You, a Gift
text: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token that attacks that player each combat if able.
flavour: My generosity blesses you all, even the undeserving.

title: Know Evil
text: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, up to one target opponent can't attack with creatures, up to one target opponent can't cast creature spells, and up to one target opponent can't cast noncreature spells. You can't choose any player as a target more than once.

title: Make Yourself Useful
text: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy target creature an opponent controls. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.
flavour: To think you've spent years honing your body only to die like this.

title: My Forces Are Innumerable
text: At the beginning of your end step, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token.
abandonIf: At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may sacrifice two creatures. If they do, abandon this scheme.

title: My Laughter Echoes
abandonIf: Whenever you set a non-ongoing scheme in motion, you may abandon this scheme. If you do, set that scheme in motion again.
flavour: Groveling already? I'm just starting to enjoy myself.

title: No One Will Hear Your Cries
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent chooses a creature he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.
flavour: Groveling already? I'm just starting to enjoy myself.

title: Pay Tribute to Me
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control six or more lands, each opponent sacrifices another creature.

title: Power Without Equal
text: When you set this scheme in motion, draw three cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn. If you control six or more lands, you may cast up to three nonland cards from your hand without paying their mana costs.

title: The Mighty Will Fall
text: When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. That player loses 7 life.
flavour: Cry out for your comrades so that they may join you in misery.

title: There Is No Refuge
text: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals 3 damage to up to one target creature. Create a 3/3 black Horror creature token.
flavour: The dunes smell spilled blood.

title: This World Belongs to Me
text: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. You may play an additional land this turn.
flavour: Little insects, I have created entire worlds and extinguished twice as many.

title: What's Yours Is Now Mine
text: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls and untap it.
flavour: Vow your allegiance to true power.

title: When Will You Learn?
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent exiles the top card of his or her library. You may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
flavour: Don't fret, infants. It wouldn't have worked anyway.
